data.message: Hands up if you scrolled past and went back because you thought Eminem was announcing a new album but then died a lil inside when you realise it's just some shit yellingwolf. Come on em stop teasing, your albums are the only thing keeping me from drinking rat poison Hamid Mustafawi😂😂😂

replies.message: Haha no mate yelawolf its pretty good
a dumb ass stan smmfh. the day em release another good ass album at the level of love story we can talk

Hahah knew I'd get some hate haha I don't mind Yellawolf but am seriously waiting to see if Eminem can come back, I hear he's working with Dre again so fingers crossed but yes nothing will ever be the same as early 00's eminem.
Marcus Carrión Em's albums are only getting better. He's getting way more lyrical each time. You should listen to "syllables" it sums you up pretty good.
Agree aric true fans know this! Fuck his old music I want his new music!

Matthew Jeffery he is and I hope it's his last album not in a bad way either, he could throw in a song with Dre as the last one on the album telling about how he can't thank him enough for what he's done, it'll be similar to I need a doctor but better it would be such a good song!👌🏻
Yeah as much as it sucks I think ems had he's time.
You fucks talking about he’s only getting better look like you were toddlers when his shit came out. Fuck outta here
Aric Sprinkle lmfao syllables sums me up? So you implying I only care bout catchy hook and fire beat.... Like I aint heard syllables before😴 you stupid for real
